Timeline with Cards

Timelines with cards are a more complex variation on simpler text-based timelines.

Style Notes:

  1. The preferred color for cards (as with all other card types) is deep teal. However, other color options are available below in case distinguishing can help in the organization of materials in a timeline or across multiple timelines.
  2. Multi-color card sets are discouraged.
  3. The preferred formatting for card sets is single-column. 2-Column options are available, but are not preferred. The code is written in such a way as to ensure that the single-column format is always the default on smaller screens. Please format columns consistently within a timeline. In other words, if you format one timeline point in a single column, do not format the next one in two columns.
  4. Make sure to change both the heading-level text and the card title text to make the timeline fit into the information architecture of the page into which you insert it. 

Preferred Style: Deep Teal, Single-Column Format
